p: Nowadays, molecular electronics is an important emerging technology. It deals with the design, processing and device application of organic molecules at the molecular level/nanoscale level. LB technique is probably one of the best methods among various film forming techniques to realize organized molecular assemblies at nanoscale and may play a vital role towards molecular electronics. Resistive switching behaviour (bipolar and threshold) of organic molecules assembled onto LB films have been demonstrated successfully [ 84, 144]. It was possible to control the switching by optimizing the measurement protocol. This type of bipolar switching will play crucial role in future organic electronic devices especially in memory application.
